name: Tech-Revolution
description:
Description

You find yourself in the year 2050, the AI that controls the vehicles has revealed itself and is trying to wipe out humanity. You have to control an ancient armed van to wipe out as many vehicles as you can.

Collect coins by killing enemies to upgrade your weapons to beat your previous record.

Use the power-ups that appear in the level to gain an advantage over your enemy.

Controls
  • WASD keys  to move
  • Mouse pointer to aim
  • Left click to shoot
